professional_summary: Technical Support Engineer with 4 years of experience in troubleshooting and maintaining user applications, workstations, and accounts across multiple platforms (OS X, Linux, Windows, Android, iOS). Skilled in providing outstanding customer service and communicating technical concepts in a non-technical manner. Expertise in software/PC/LAN troubleshooting and telecom support.

work_experience.description: Providing remote technical support for over 120,000 employees across multiple platforms
responsibilities: Supporting Windows, OS X, Linux, and ChromeOS platforms
Installing and configuring end user software and system management software
Managing user account access with Active Directory and Google Groups
User account management and security policy implementation
